channel.title: Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Building Async APIs in ASP.NET Core - The Right Way
item.description: Not every API request needs to finish right away. Learn how to build better APIs by moving long-running tasks to the background. This guide shows practical examples using image processing in ASP.NET Core 9. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/building-async-apis-in-aspnetcore-the-right-way

item.title: HybridCache in ASP.NET Core - New Caching Library
item.description: HybridCache in .NET 9 combines fast in-memory caching with distributed caching, solving common problems like cache stampede while adding features like tag-based invalidation. This guide shows you how to use HybridCache in your applications, from basic setup to real-world usage patterns with Entity Framework Core and minimal APIs. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/hybrid-cache-in-aspnetcore-new-caching-library
